languages.text: {n}Существо отвечает вам серией хрипящих и рычащих звуков. Спустя мгновение, будто осознав, что язык его вам неясен, оно угрожающим жестом протягивает в вашу сторону боевую конечность. Вполне понятный знак: "Я — воин. Я — убийца".{/n}

{n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Существо отвечает вам серией хрипящих и рычащих звуков. Спустя мгновение, будто осознав, что язык его вам неясен, оно угрожающим жестом протягивает в вашу сторону боевую конечность. Вполне понятный знак: "Я — воин. Я — убийца".{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The creature responds with a serious of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realizing that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a threatening gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a slayer."{/n}

{n}The creature responds with a serious of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realizing that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a threatening gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a slayer."{/n}

{n}The creature responds with a serious of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a slayer."{/n}

{n}The creature responds with a serious of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a slayer."{/n}

{n}The creature responds with a serious of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

{n}The creature responds with a serious of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

{n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

languages.text: {n}その生き物は、息が詰まるような唸るような声で応える。しばらくすると、まるで言葉が通じないことに気づいたかのように、威嚇するようなしぐさであなたのほうに四肢を伸ばす。メッセージがハッキリと伝わってくる。「私は戦士だ。私は殺人者だ」{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その生き物は、息が詰まるような唸るような声で応える。しばらくすると、まるで言葉が通じないことに気づいたかのように、威嚇するようなしぐさであなたのほうに四肢を伸ばす。メッセージがハッキリと伝わってくる。「私は戦士だ。私は殺人者だ」{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只怪物咆哮着，声音嘶哑，几欲窒息。过了一会儿，它似乎意识到你听不懂它的语言，便以充满威胁的动作向你伸出了肢体，传达的信息很明确——“我是战士，也是杀手。”{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只怪物咆哮着，声音嘶哑，几欲窒息。过了一会儿，它似乎意识到你听不懂它的语言，便以充满威胁的动作向你伸出了肢体，传达的信息很明确——“我是战士，也是杀手。”{/n}

languages.text: {n}La criatura responde con una serie de sonidos ahogados y gruñidos. Al cabo de unos instantes, como si se diera cuenta de que no la entiendes, extiende un miembro de combate en tu dirección con un gesto amenazador. El mensaje es claro: «Soy un guerrero. Vivo para matar».{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura responde con una serie de sonidos ahogados y gruñidos. Al cabo de unos instantes, como si se diera cuenta de que no la entiendes, extiende un miembro de combate en tu dirección con un gesto amenazador. El mensaje es claro: «Soy un guerrero. Soy un asesino».{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Kreatur antwortet mit einer Reihe erstickter und fauchender Geräusche. Nach einem kurzen Augenblick erkennt sie offenbar, dass ihre Sprache dir nicht verständlich ist, und streckt mit einer bedrohlichen Geste eine Kampfgliedmaße in deine Richtung aus. Die Botschaft ist klar: "Ich bin ein Krieger. Ich bin ein Killer."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kreatur antwortet mit einer Reihe erstickter und fauchender Geräusche. Nach einem kurzen Augenblick erkennt sie offenbar, dass ihre Sprache dir nicht verständlich ist, und streckt mit einer bedrohlichen Geste eine Kampfgliedmaße in deine Richtung aus. Die Botschaft ist klar: "Ich bin ein Krieger. Ich bin ein Mörder."{/n}

{n}Die Kreatur antwortet mit einer Reihe erstickter und fauchender Geräusche. Nach einem kurzen Augenblick erkennt sie offenbar, dass ihre Sprache dir nicht verständlich ist, und streckt mit einer bedrohlichen Geste eine Kampfgliedmaße in deine Richtung aus. Die Botschaft ist klar: "Ich bin ein Krieger. Ich bin ein Killer."{/n}

languages.text: {n}La créature vous répond par une cacophonie de bruits étouffés et de grognements, mais, comprenant que son langage vous est inconnu, elle finit par étendre l'un de ses membres dans votre direction d'un geste menaçant. Le message est clair : « Je suis un guerrier. Je suis un tueur. »{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature vous répond par une cacophonie de bruits étouffés et de grognements, mais, comprenant que son langage vous est inconnu, elle finit par étendre l'un de ses membres dans votre direction d'un geste menaçant. Le message est clair : « Je suis un guerrier. Je suis un tueur. »{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaratık, bir dizi boğulma ve hırlama sesiyle yanıt veriyor. Bir süre sonra, konuştuğu dilin senin için anlam ifade etmediğini anlamış gibi, savaşmaya yarayan bir uzvunu tehditkâr bir edayla sana doğrultuyor. Verdiği mesaj net: "Ben savaşçıyım. Ben katilim."{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The creature responds with a series of choking and snarling sounds. After a moment, as if realising that its language is not clear to you, it extends a fighting limb in your direction in a menacing gesture. The message is clear: "I am a warrior. I am a killer."{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaratık ciddi bir boğulma ve hırlama sesiyle yanıt veriyor. Bir süre sonra konuştuğu dilin senin için bir anlam ifade etmediğini anlamış gibi, savaşmaya yarayan bir uzvunu tehditkâr bir edayla sana doğrultuyor. Verdiği mesaj net: "Ben bir savaşçıyım. Ben bir katilim."{/n}
